CustomField.formula: IF( Site__c = "AU", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=1000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=2599), "NSW", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=2619,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=2899), "NSW", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=2921,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=2999), "NSW", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=0200,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=0299), "ACT", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=2600,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=2618), "ACT", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=2900,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=2920), "ACT", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=3000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=3999), "VIC", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=8000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=8999), "VIC", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=4000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=4999), "QLD", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=9000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=9999), "QLD", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=5000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=5999), "SA", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=6000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=6999), "WA", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=7000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=7999), "TAS", IF(AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=0800,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=0999), "NT", "Other")))))))))))))), IF( AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=0000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=6999), "North Island", IF( AND( VALUE(POSTCODE__c) >=7000,VALUE(POSTCODE__c)<=9999), "South Island", "Other" )) )
CustomField.label: State
